ValidationRule.description:
For 609.1, User can the opportunity push it back to 'Internal Review' or 'Closed - Cancelled'.
Users should not have the ability to push the 609.1 Opportunity to the 'Proposal' or 'Negotiation' stage.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot push the 609.1 Opportunity to the 'Proposal' or 'Negotiation' stage
